P.FONT: Paul: Hey, Mike!
Mike: Yes?
Paul: Did you know that 50% of the world’s population is under 25 years old?
Mike: No, I didn’t.
Paul: And that women make up 49% of the world’s population! Yeah. I’ve just found this great website with all sorts of interesting facts.
Mike: Oh.
Paul: Listen to this one.
Mike: Paul! I’m trying to read!
Paul: But it’s about reading. Apparently 2,000,000,000 people in the world can’t read.
Mike: Well, that doesn’t surprise me.
Paul: And what do you think is the highest selling song of all time?
Mike: Maybe 'White Christmas'?
Paul: Not bad. That’s the second best selling. It sold 30,000,000. The top selling single was 'Candle in the Wind 1997' by Elton John. It sold 33,000,000 copies.
Mike: Oh, that was the one when Princess Diana died?
Paul: Yeah, that’s right. Listen to this. The largest iceberg ever found was 335 km long and 97 km wide.
Mike: Yeah, yeah.
Paul: Air becomes liquid at –190 degrees Celsius. I didn’t know that!
Mike: Paul!!
Paul: Ah. You’ll be interested in this. It’s the sports section. Which football team has won more championships than any other?
Mike: Do you mean in the world or in Europe?
Paul: No, I don’t want to disturb you. I’ll be quiet.
Mike: It must be Brazil or Argentina.
